## Summary

- What changed and why?

## Content Changed

- List changed notes under `content/notes/`.

## Checklist

- [ ] Frontmatter is valid (`title` present, `date`/`slug` format correct)
- [ ] Slugs are stable and unique
- [ ] Markdown is valid (code fences closed)
- [ ] Notes include meaningful tags
- [ ] `yarn validate:notes` passes
- [ ] `yarn build` passes
